onChange.script:
if system.date.isBefore(self.custom.equipmentScheduleData.startDate, self.custom.equipmentScheduleData.endDate):
		import copy
		
#		system.perspective.print("date range change")
		
		sDate = self.custom.equipmentScheduleData.startDate
		eDate = self.custom.equipmentScheduleData.endDate
		breakEvents = self.custom.equipmentScheduleData.breakEvents
		downtimeEvents = self.custom.equipmentScheduleData.downtimeEvents
		items = self.custom.equipmentScheduleData.items
		scheduledEvents = self.custom.equipmentScheduleData.scheduledEvents
		
		equipmentNameViewInstances = []
		equipmentEventViewInstances = []
		relativeLeftPercent = 0
		relativeItemTop = 0
		relativeScheduledEventTop = 0
		relativeDowntimeTop = 0
		relativeBreakTop = -110
		relativeTop = 0
		canvasStructure = {
		  "position": "relative",
		  "top": "0px",
		  "left": "0px",
		  "bottom": "auto",
		  "right": "auto",
		  "zIndex": 4,
		  "width": "150px",
		  "height": "55px",
		  "viewPath": "equipment-schedule/equipment-row/equipment-name",
		  "viewParams": {},
		  "style": {
			"classes": ""
		  }
		}
		
		#Determine minutes between overall start & end date.
		totalMinutes = system.date.minutesBetween(sDate, eDate)
#		system.perspective.print("totalMinutes: %s" % (totalMinutes))
#		system.perspective.print("------------------------------")
		
		#Calculates the relative positioning & width of each view instance, & build each View Canvas instance JSON structure for equipment row.
		#Loop through items.
		for row in range(items.rowCount):
			thisItemNameStructure = copy.deepcopy(canvasStructure)
			
			#Get view instance parameters.
			itemID = items.getValueAt(row, "ID")
			itemLabel = items.getValueAt(row, "Label")
			statusImagePath = items.getValueAt(row, "StatusImagePath")
			itemForegroundColor = items.getValueAt(row, "Foreground")
			itemBackgroundColor = items.getValueAt(row, "Background")
			
			#Convert color to hex.
			if "#" not in itemForegroundColor:
				c = itemForegroundColor.replace("color(", "")
				c = c.replace("color", "")
				c = c.replace("(", "")
				c = c.replace(")", "")
				c = c.split(",")
				c[0] = int(c[0])
				c[1] = int(c[1])
				c[2] = int(c[2])
				c[3] = int(c[3])
				t = tuple(c)
				itemForegroundColor = "#%02x%02x%02x%02x" % t
			
			if "#" not in itemBackgroundColor:
				c = itemBackgroundColor.replace("color(", "")
				c = c.replace("color", "")
				c = c.replace("(", "")
				c = c.replace(")", "")
				c = c.split(",")
				c[0] = int(c[0])
				c[1] = int(c[1])
				c[2] = int(c[2])
				c[3] = int(c[3])
				t = tuple(c)
				itemBackgroundColor = "#%02x%02x%02x%02x" % t
			
			#Set view instance parameters.
			itemViewParams = {	"label": itemLabel, 
								"statusImagePath": statusImagePath, 
								"foregroundColor": itemForegroundColor, 
								"backgroundColor": itemBackgroundColor
			}
			thisItemNameStructure["viewParams"] = itemViewParams
#			system.perspective.print("ITEM - row: %s | ID: %s | Label: %s" % (row, itemID, itemLabel))
#			system.perspective.print("ITEM - VIEW PARAMS: %s" % (itemViewParams))
#			system.perspective.print("------------------------------")
			
			#Append equipment-name view instance to the equipmentNameViewInstances list.
			equipmentNameViewInstances.append(thisItemNameStructure)
			
			#Loop through scheduled events.
			for row2 in range(scheduledEvents.rowCount):
				eventItemID = scheduledEvents.getValueAt(row2, "ItemID")
				eventStartDate = scheduledEvents.getValueAt(row2, "StartDate")
				eventEndDate = scheduledEvents.getValueAt(row2, "EndDate")
				
				if eventItemID == itemID and ((system.date.isAfter(sDate, eventStartDate) and system.date.isBefore(sDate, eventEndDate)) 
					or (system.date.isBefore(eventStartDate, eDate) and system.date.isAfter(eventStartDate, sDate)) 
					or (system.date.isAfter(eventStartDate, sDate) and system.date.isBefore(eventEndDate, eDate))):
					thisScheduledEventStructure = copy.deepcopy(canvasStructure)
				
					#Get view instance parameters.
					eventID = scheduledEvents.getValueAt(row2, "EventID")
					eventStartDate = scheduledEvents.getValueAt(row2, "StartDate")
					eventEndDate = scheduledEvents.getValueAt(row2, "EndDate")
					eventLabel = scheduledEvents.getValueAt(row2, "Label")
					eventForegroundColor = scheduledEvents.getValueAt(row2, "Foreground")
					eventBackgroundColor = scheduledEvents.getValueAt(row2, "Background")
					eventLeadTime = scheduledEvents.getValueAt(row2, "LeadTime")
					eventLeadColor = scheduledEvents.getValueAt(row2, "LeadColor")
					eventPctDone = scheduledEvents.getValueAt(row2, "PctDone")
					
					if system.date.isBefore(eventStartDate, sDate):
						eventStartDate = sDate
					
					if system.date.isAfter(eventEndDate, eDate):
						eventEndDate = eDate
					
					#Convert color to hex.
					if "#" not in eventBackgroundColor:
						c = eventBackgroundColor.replace("color(", "")
						c = c.replace("color", "")
						c = c.replace("(", "")
						c = c.replace(")", "")
						c = c.split(",")
						c[0] = int(c[0])
						c[1] = int(c[1])
						c[2] = int(c[2])
						c[3] = int(c[3])
						t = tuple(c)
						eventBackgroundColor = "#%02x%02x%02x%02x" % t
					
					if "#" not in eventForegroundColor:
						c = eventForegroundColor.replace("color(", "")
						c = c.replace("color", "")
						c = c.replace("(", "")
						c = c.replace(")", "")
						c = c.split(",")
						c[0] = int(c[0])
						c[1] = int(c[1])
						c[2] = int(c[2])
						c[3] = int(c[3])
						t = tuple(c)
						eventForegroundColor = "#%02x%02x%02x%02x" % t
					
					if "#" not in eventLeadColor:
						c = eventLeadColor.replace("color(", "")
						c = c.replace("color", "")
						c = c.replace("(", "")
						c = c.replace(")", "")
						c = c.split(",")
						c[0] = int(c[0])
						c[1] = int(c[1])
						c[2] = int(c[2])
						c[3] = int(c[3])
						
						#Handle non-transparent lead color.
						if c[3] == 255:
							c[3] = 175
							
						t = tuple(c)
						eventLeadColor = "#%02x%02x%02x%02x" % t
						
					#Set view instance parameters.
					scheduledEventViewParams = {	"backgroundColor": eventBackgroundColor, 
													"endDate": eventEndDate, 
													"eventID": eventID, 
													"foregroundColor": eventForegroundColor, 
													"itemID": eventItemID, 
													"label": eventLabel, 
													"leadColor": eventLeadColor, 
													"leadTime": eventLeadTime, 
													"percentDone": eventPctDone, 
													"startDate": eventStartDate
					}
					
#					system.perspective.print("SCHEDULED EVENT - row: %s | ItemID: %s | EventID: %s | Label: %s | StartDate: %s | EndDate: %s" % (row2, eventItemID, eventID, eventLabel, eventStartDate, eventEndDate))
#					system.perspective.print("SCHEDULED EVENT - VIEW PARAMS: %s" % (scheduledEventViewParams))
					
					#Calculate view instance width.
					eventMinutes = system.date.minutesBetween(eventStartDate, eventEndDate) * 1.0
					viewWidthPercent = (eventMinutes/totalMinutes) * 100
					if viewWidthPercent >= 100:
						viewWidthPercent = 100
#					system.perspective.print("SCHEDULED EVENT - eventMinutes: %s | viewWidthPercent %s" % (eventMinutes, viewWidthPercent))
					
					#Calculate view instance start position.
					eventStartMinutes = system.date.minutesBetween(sDate, eventStartDate) * 1.0
					viewLeftPercent = (eventStartMinutes/totalMinutes) * 100
#					system.perspective.print("SCHEDULED EVENT - eventStartMinutes: %s | viewLeftPercent %s" % (eventStartMinutes, viewLeftPercent))
					
					#Set view instance properties.
					thisScheduledEventStructure["top"] = "%s" % relativeTop + "px"
					thisScheduledEventStructure["left"] = ("%s" % viewLeftPercent) + "%"
					thisScheduledEventStructure["width"] = ("%s" % viewWidthPercent) + "%"
					thisScheduledEventStructure["zIndex"] = 2
					thisScheduledEventStructure["viewPath"] = "equipment-schedule/equipment-row/scheduled-event"
					thisScheduledEventStructure["viewParams"] = scheduledEventViewParams
					
					#Append view instance to the equipmentEventViewInstances list.
					equipmentEventViewInstances.append(thisScheduledEventStructure)
					
					#Decrement relativeTop position.
					relativeTop -= 55
					
					#Add view instance for lead time if lead time > 0 seconds.
					if eventLeadTime > 0:
						thisLeadTimeStructure = copy.deepcopy(canvasStructure)
						leadTimeViewParams = {"leadTime": eventLeadTime, "leadColor": eventLeadColor, "eventID": eventID}
						
						#Calculate view instance width.
						eventMinutes = eventLeadTime/60.0
						viewWidthPercent = (eventMinutes/totalMinutes) * 100
						if viewWidthPercent >= 100:
							viewWidthPercent = 100
						
						#Set view instance properties.
						thisLeadTimeStructure["top"] = "%s" % relativeTop + "px"
						thisLeadTimeStructure["left"] = ("%s" % viewLeftPercent) + "%"
						thisLeadTimeStructure["width"] = ("%s" % viewWidthPercent) + "%"
						thisLeadTimeStructure["zIndex"] = 3
						thisLeadTimeStructure["viewPath"] = "equipment-schedule/equipment-row/scheduled-event-lead-time"
						thisLeadTimeStructure["viewParams"] = scheduledEventViewParams
						
						#Append view instance to the equipmentEventViewInstances list.
						equipmentEventViewInstances.append(thisLeadTimeStructure)
						
						#Decrement relativeTop position.
						relativeTop -= 55
						
			#Loop through scheduled events.
			for row3 in range(downtimeEvents.rowCount):
				downtimeItemID = downtimeEvents.getValueAt(row3, "ItemID")	
				downtimeStartDate = downtimeEvents.getValueAt(row3, "StartDate")	
				downtimeEndDate = downtimeEvents.getValueAt(row3, "EndDate")
				
#				relativeDowntimeTop = relativeScheduledEventTop - 55
				if downtimeItemID == itemID and ((system.date.isAfter(sDate, downtimeStartDate) and system.date.isBefore(sDate, downtimeEndDate)) 
					or (system.date.isBefore(downtimeStartDate, eDate) and system.date.isAfter(downtimeStartDate, sDate)) 
					or (system.date.isAfter(downtimeStartDate, sDate) and system.date.isBefore(downtimeEndDate, eDate))):
					thisDowntimeStructure = copy.deepcopy(canvasStructure)
					
					#Get view instance parameters.
					downtimeItemID = downtimeEvents.getValueAt(row3, "ItemID")	
					downtimeColor = downtimeEvents.getValueAt(row3, "Color")	
					downtimeLayer = downtimeEvents.getValueAt(row3, "Layer")	
					
					if system.date.isBefore(downtimeStartDate, sDate):
						downtimeStartDate = sDate
										
					if system.date.isAfter(downtimeEndDate, eDate):
						downtimeEndDate = eDate
					
					#Convert color to hex.
					if "#" not in downtimeColor:
						c = downtimeColor.replace("color(", "")
						c = c.replace("color", "")
						c = c.replace("(", "")
						c = c.replace(")", "")
						c = c.split(",")
						c[0] = int(c[0])
						c[1] = int(c[1])
						c[2] = int(c[2])
						c[3] = int(c[3])
						t = tuple(c)
						downtimeColor = "#%02x%02x%02x%02x" % t
										
					#Set view instance parameters.
					downtimeViewParams = {	"itemID": downtimeItemID, 
											"startDate": downtimeStartDate, 
											"endDate": downtimeEndDate, 
											"color": downtimeColor, 
											"layer": downtimeLayer
					}
					
#					system.perspective.print("DOWNTIME EVENT - row: %s | ItemID: %s | StartDate: %s | EndDate: %s | Layer: %s" % (row3, downtimeItemID, downtimeStartDate, downtimeEndDate, downtimeLayer))

					#Calculate view instance width.
					downtimeMinutes = system.date.minutesBetween(downtimeStartDate, downtimeEndDate) * 1.0
					viewWidthPercent = (downtimeMinutes/totalMinutes) * 100
					if viewWidthPercent >= 100:
						viewWidthPercent = 100
#					system.perspective.print("DOWNTIME EVENT - downtimeMinutes: %s | viewWidthPercent %s" % (downtimeMinutes, viewWidthPercent))
					
					#Calculate view instance start position.
					downtimeStartMinutes = system.date.minutesBetween(sDate, downtimeStartDate) * 1.0
					viewLeftPercent = (downtimeStartMinutes/totalMinutes) * 100
#					system.perspective.print("DOWNTIME EVENT - downtimeStartMinutes: %s | viewLeftPercent %s" % (eventStartMinutes, viewLeftPercent))
					
					#Set view instance properties.
					thisDowntimeStructure["top"] = "%s" % relativeTop + "px"
					thisDowntimeStructure["left"] = ("%s" % viewLeftPercent) + "%"
					thisDowntimeStructure["width"] = ("%s" % viewWidthPercent) + "%"
					thisDowntimeStructure["zIndex"] = 4
					thisDowntimeStructure["viewPath"] = "equipment-schedule/equipment-row/downtime-event"
					thisDowntimeStructure["viewParams"] = downtimeViewParams
					
					#Append view instance to the equipmentEventViewInstances list.
					equipmentEventViewInstances.append(thisDowntimeStructure)
					
					#Decrement relativeTop position.
					relativeTop -= 55
			
			#Loop through the break events.
			for row in range(breakEvents.rowCount):
				thisBreakStructure = copy.deepcopy(canvasStructure)
				
				#Get view instance parameters.
				breakStartDate = breakEvents.getValueAt(row, "StartDate")
				breakEndDate = breakEvents.getValueAt(row, "EndDate")
				breakColor = breakEvents.getValueAt(row, "Color")
				
				if ((system.date.isAfter(sDate, breakStartDate) and system.date.isBefore(sDate, breakEndDate)) 
					or (system.date.isBefore(breakStartDate, eDate) and system.date.isAfter(breakStartDate, sDate)) 
					or (system.date.isAfter(breakStartDate, sDate) and system.date.isBefore(breakEndDate, eDate))):
					
					if system.date.isBefore(breakStartDate, sDate):
						downtimeStartDate = sDate
										
					if system.date.isAfter(breakEndDate, eDate):
						downtimeEndDate = eDate
					
					if "#" not in breakColor:
						c = breakColor.replace("color(", "")
						c = c.replace("color", "")
						c = c.replace("(", "")
						c = c.replace(")", "")
						c = c.split(",")
						c[0] = int(c[0])
						c[1] = int(c[1])
						c[2] = int(c[2])
						c[3] = int(c[3])
						t = tuple(c)
						breakColor = "#%02x%02x%02x%02x" % t
						
					#Set view instance parameters.
					breakViewParams = {"startDate": breakStartDate, "endDate": breakEndDate, "color": breakColor}
					
	#				system.perspective.print("BREAK EVENT - row: %s | StartDate: %s | EndDate: %s" % (row, breakStartDate, breakEndDate))
					
					#Calculate view instance width.
					breakMinutes = system.date.minutesBetween(breakStartDate, breakEndDate) * 1.0
					viewWidthPercent = (breakMinutes/totalMinutes) * 100
					if viewWidthPercent >= 100:
						viewWidthPercent = 100
	#				system.perspective.print("BREAKTIME EVENT - breakMinutes: %s | viewWidthPercent %s" % (breakMinutes, viewWidthPercent))
					
					#Calculate view instance start position.
					breakStartMinutes = system.date.minutesBetween(sDate, breakStartDate) * 1.0
					viewLeftPercent = (breakStartMinutes/totalMinutes) * 100
	#				system.perspective.print("BREAKTIME EVENT - breakStartMinutes: %s | viewLeftPercent %s" % (breakStartMinutes, viewLeftPercent))
		
					#Set view instance properties.
					thisBreakStructure["top"] = "%s" % relativeTop + "px"
					thisBreakStructure["left"] = ("%s" % viewLeftPercent) + "%"
					thisBreakStructure["width"] = ("%s" % viewWidthPercent) + "%"
					thisBreakStructure["zIndex"] = 1
					thisBreakStructure["viewPath"] = "equipment-schedule/equipment-row/breaktime-event"
					thisBreakStructure["viewParams"] = breakViewParams
					
					#Append view instance to the equipmentEventViewInstances list.
					equipmentEventViewInstances.append(thisBreakStructure)
					
					#Decrement relativeTop position.
					relativeTop -= 55
			
			#Increment relativeTop position for the "next row".	
			relativeTop += 55
		
		#Set the View Canvas instances property.
		self.getChild("root").getChild("chart").getChild("equipment").getChild("equipmentNamesViewCanvas").props.instances = equipmentNameViewInstances
		self.getChild("root").getChild("chart").getChild("equipment").getChild("equipmentEventsViewCanvas").props.instances = equipmentEventViewInstances
		
#	else:
		#REPLACE w/ popup message to notify user.
#		system.perspective.print("Selected end date must be after start date. Reselect start and/or end date.")

props.text: Start date must be earlier than end date.
